entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `PathUtility.HasExtension` doesn't correctly consider case sensitivity of file system #47705
  • GenerateToolsSettingsFile races to write DotnetToolSettings.xml in parallel MTFM builds. #47696
  • dotnet watch crashes with "The WebSocket is in an invalid state ('Aborted') for this operation. Vallid states are: 'Open, CloseReceived'" #47685

Closed

  • When trying to install a tool where the required runtime isn't installed, a bad error message is generated #46566
  • Redundant SCA reports #45750
  • `BuildArgsWithDotnetRun` doesn't forward global properties #47614
    10.0.1xx
  • Revise `TryGetProjectOrSolutionFilePath` and `GetSolutionFilePaths` logic for the new dotnet test experience #47635
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet tool restore started failing on macOS with NU3037 and NU3028 errors after 11th February #46857
    9.0.3xx
  • New dotnet test experience should produce binlog for the evaluation done to calculate TestModules #47494
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update implicit versions for March #47710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update prerelease branding for preview 4 #47709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove publishing opt-out for nuget assets #47708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove RunSettingsFilePath support from dotnet test for MTP #47706
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Remove no longer used TestOptions.Configuration #47703
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds incrementalism to DefineStaticWebAssets #47701
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve baselining #47700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 10.0.100-preview.2.25164.1 March 2025 Updates #47699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ThreadPoolSpinCount config var #47697
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid using AssetDetails, but FileLength and LastWriteTime directly on StaticWebAsset #47695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • allow container targets to be loaded directly for multi-rid publish invocations since we handle that now #47693
    untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.3xx] light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47691
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Backport perf fixes #47689
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump versions for test templates #47688
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up #nullable disable from test directory #47686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Forward global props to dotnet run #47694
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Check for Muxer path relative to base directory #47664
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add command 'dotnet project convert' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Compare tar.gz files between VMR and current .NET builds #47667
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor binlog and use in dotnet test and dotnet run #47660
    Area-dotnet test
  • Update MSTest templates for .NET 10 #47658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create tsaoptions.json for VMR #47668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add IBC switch and disable by default #47670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update `dotnet run file.cs` spec with new ignored directives syntax #47543
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.2.25160.1 #47447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Move command folder sources #47620
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • dotnet CLI: Removed CommandLineValidation directory #47619
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • enforce OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Remove `ForceDryRunSigning=true` on Mac & Linux signed builds #47461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Harden metadata handler invoker against bad metadata #47433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet package list should not throw if project not specified #47402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.4xx] add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47475
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.16
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Get project DefaultProjectTypeGuid #47661
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-CLI, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.5
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [TEST] Enable build check for sdk build #45952
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add cgmanifest.json for test templates #47652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge redist installer with redist #47659
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
